dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Mortal, you dare to trespass into the realm of shadows? What foolishness drives you here?

playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge and power? Mortals are always blinded by their ambitions. Your words carry no weight here.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I mean no harm. I seek only to understand.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Understanding... a feeble excuse. Ignorance is bliss, mortal.
As you should, weakling. Begone from these shadows.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not be threatened by shadows!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words for a feeble being. Prepare to face the darkness.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will take what I want by force, shadow.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Violence... a language you understand. The shadows hunger for your essence.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am not afraid. Face me, creature!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Brave or foolish, mortal? Let us see if your courage matches your words.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will retreat for now. This is not worth the risk.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Cowardice... the shadows despise weakness. Begone, before they consume you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no time for games. Show yourself.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Impatience... a mortal flaw. You will find me when the shadows decree it.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I demand answers! Who are you?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Curiosity will be your downfall, mortal. Prepare for the shadows' embrace.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not cower before shadows. Face me!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish pride. The shadows shall feast upon your arrogance.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave this place. It holds no answers for me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: As you should, ignorant one. The shadows care not for your struggles.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave now. This encounter is meaningless.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Meaningless? Your presence disturbs the balance. The shadows may choose to end it.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no fear of shadows. Come forth!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Boldness in the face of insignificance. Let the shadows judge your worth.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will depart. Your realm is not worth the trouble.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: As it should be. The shadows will forget your existence.
